customer_reviews.title: Update: No longer a Great non-stick pot
customer_reviews.text: Great non-stick pot. Clean up is super easy. I haven't had any problems with sticking or peeling yet. Hopefully it will last a long time. Update: It did start to stick after awhile but I had to throw mine out because the coating was starting to chip and I'm not sure if it's aluminum under the coating. Better to be safe than sorry. Oh well back to searching for a non stick pot that will last and not be toxic.

customer_reviews.title: This is a terrible pan. It chars so quickly
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this pan for over a year now and been meaning to write a review for a long time. This is a terrible pan. It chars so quickly, and works only if the food is cooked in super low flame with frequent stirring. Of course, it is non stick, so the charring comes off easily with more heat. The construction is sturdy but it is practically pointless if it burns easily, specially for day to day Indian cuisine.

customer_reviews.title: Best in the market
customer_reviews.text: I have several WearEver Ceramics pans now. They are simply the best ever. The food doesn't stick to the pan making for easy clean-up. With these pans, food is easier to prepare as well. Less oils needed and you don't have food lingering on the edges. They cook evenly and are very well constructed. I bought this for a gift for my elderly mother. She was concerned at first about the weight until she used it. She has fallen in love with it and swears it is the best thing invented for the kitchen since plug-in refrigerators. 5 Stars is not enough for this product.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Awesome Awesome Saucepan

I also like how the white ceramic coating makes it easy to see the food. And the color and shape and size is great too. Handle has a nice cool grip. And the handle makes it easy to hold the pan (great grip!) even with wet hands. I will be buying the entire set!!!

customer_reviews.text: Thought we would love this Ceramic pan. Unfortunately we had to stop using the pan as it scratched our glass stove top. Maybe i missed something in the description. The bottom of the pan is very sharp and the bottom of the pan is obviously harder than our glass stove top.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Did not perform as advertised over the long haul.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pan in April 2016 and have used it for a year now. The first six months the pan performed as advertised. Even though it said metal utensils could be used I used nonmetal utensils when cooking and used metal fork or spoon to retrieve food after cooked. The pan is now starting to chip so I will have to throw it out as I am worried about pieces of coating in my food.
